WRITING.TITLE: Build for bard

English not native language so dont h8 m8.

I dont know if they will bring the ardent nerf.It is way too big nerf and it will bring down all enhancer supports.They removed the healing and now they will cut to half the on hit dmg and the attack speed. For bardians is good thing although cause he is not a healing support.

WRITING.TITLE: Bad matchmaking in league
WRITING.TEXT: I just played a game where my team was 3 ranged vs 2 melle(bakko raigon) and one support.It was a ranked game and not a casual.Isnt supposed the 3v3 ranked games be 1 supp,1 mellee and 1 ranged comp? I am afraid that if i play support ,we will be 3 supports healing each other.....

They have to fix the matchmaking to be one supp,one mellee and one ranged. There is reason why 3 supports or 3 mellees arent as good as a balanced team. The 3v3 is the esport mode for this reason(i guess).
Oh boy.....what a time to be alive
Pestilus is my favorite cause he is very flexible and very good if you hit your spells.He has a bit of everything(dmg ,cc,escape,tankiness)

i hope they release prehistoric event too,there are lot of players that dont find any worth to buy from accessories(or unlocked too many from ea).So prehistoric accessories will bring new interesting things

WRITING.TITLE: Predator rune give wrong stats?
WRITING.TEXT: I tested the new rune cause i was feeling i wasnt getting the 45% extra speed that rune was telling and the results are: With simple boots bard had 355 and with predator was getting to 487(not 515 that it was supposed to go) With mobility boots the speed was 439 and with predator active was getting to 553 (not 636 that it was supposed to go ) Also for those that they believe that the rune works with base ms ,bard has 330 ms and with predator active it goes 462 (not 478 it was supposed to go(In this theory we just buy boots,make the experiment and we reduce 25 ms from the final number) If someone knows how the extra speed works,he is welcome to say his opinion
What?

WRITING.TITLE: Make league great again?!
WRITING.TEXT: Preaseason ends soon,so if you dont want some boring 1-D league of legends but something refreshing,you have to speak now.The time is running out,so tell your ideas cause sometimes even the troll ideas are the best one like the first version of urf etc. Sometimes the community has to step up and show the right way. Maybe fixing perfomance issues or gameplay issues like creating a new role,a new innovative item system(like wearing the items XD), deleting some things or creating new ones?Who knows. It is in our hands to make this game great (again?).

Dont worry,Drive Knight is with the good guys.

WRITING.TITLE: Question about screen replacement
WRITING.TEXT: My gba sp had his screen broke(it fell ) and the screen is white(but the gameboy works,only screen broke up).I was thinking about replacing the screen.Although,the screen replacement for sp is 40-50$ and i dont think its worth to invest so much money cause i dont even know for sure if i will be able to replace it with success.So i was thinking to replace it with a gba screen that costs 5$.(they have the same size but it doesnt have backlight afaik). So my real question is : Can i replace a gba sp screen with a gba screen?Or it is incompatible? Also do you know if gba sp uses only 40 pin screen?

Its a smart choice but here are my problems about the item First,its a not working gba sp(as title says)but the 300 reviews about the product are controversial.All reviews say that the gba sp works great?!But in item description it says that it doesnt work Second and most crucial and that it doesnt says why the gba doesnt work.It could be a lot of reasons like dead battery,broken motherboard or even my situation that it broke something inside the lcd.So it seems like a risk So i still think about either bying a cheap gba screen or to take your idea....Have you bought from him?Cause the reviews about the item are weird

Okay thnx for the help,i will search about it. My thought now is to probably buy the 5$ gba screen and if i am dissatisfied,i will use your idea. But still not sure if gba lcd screen will be combatible.i need to search it more. I would also like to ask if you know what pins gba sp uses.32 or 40 pins?

Why i need adapter although to install gba screen?I thought i would do the same thing as i would do installing gba sp screen.Link me if possible what adapter you mean and also why i need to use adapter Also did you used 40 pin gba screen?

Btw just saying that its not worth to sell my gba sp for parts cause it is 95% probability that only my screen got damaged and everything else is fine(i made some testing). Also i can buy a screen for gba sp but is 10x bigger its price instead of gba.As gba is only 5$,i think its worth the risk.

Also i could buy a not working gba for its screen(for 20$),but they dont say what makes the gba sp dead( it can be a lot of reasons),so its like 10% possibility that they may broke the screen(or something inside the screen).
Unstoppable btw

WRITING.TITLE: Sad fact about the new swain skin
WRITING.TEXT: Its sad and most likely unfortunate that the real creator of this skin idea, that posted his idea(6-7 years ago) about dragon master swain with a delicate way in lol forum and got over 10000(10K) comments and over 10k upvotes(including rioters like riotblastoise,guinso,udyr etc),has stopped playing league and he will never experience his creation that has come back to life. Edit:For those that dont know,here is the link to forum http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1158089 amp;page=1 And the guy is/was named neonir(the real creator of this idea)
The real idea owner was the guy named neonir and the proof is in the link that i added to the post.
If you are the real,then who is the guy named neonir in reddit that made a post today about swain skin?
Although its unfortunate that riot didnt called you(as the real skin creator),so you can tell them your ideal skin(how it has to look like) and make it similar to your idea.
Now you can die in peace?
The cycle of life and death continues.
UNSTOPPABLE BTW
I see that you upgrade e second.So my question is how you place your e?You try to hit him with the wall(pretty difficult cause it has delay) or you place it so the enemy cant leave the area?

I would also like to ask you,whats the thing that you think that makes veigar op(in its own way)?Is he weak early and focus only farm or you can force fights?Do you change runes vs hard matchups(stopwatch etc).Last thing is that i think that ingenious hunter is better from relentless cause:1 More trinkets=more vision(cause veig is weak to ganks),2 More trinkets=More ghost wards(so you utilize the ghhost ward better) ,3 Way smaller CDs to archanger and zhyonias,4 Smaller CD to your boots :^). So what you think about all these?

ok one other thing is why you take manaflow band when from the 1st back you get tear? Its actually useless as you never get out of mana especially with archangel 1st item.You could take waterwalking(for quicker roam),or nullifying orb or transcedense or cooldown etc.
If you didnt had manaflow band as an option,what you think is the 2nd best option in sorcery?
Yo Pablo,you just got your happy little ass beat
Do you think nami is weak now?She is good early but mid-late game i think that you cant do much because bubble small range+Low projectile speed and ult is slow and easily dodgable.

WRITING.TITLE: Secret broken item,take your rightful LP before they take it out
WRITING.TEXT: The items do what it says in description(right riot?). So if you see either in item sets either ingame,the item Locket of the Iron Solari description says:After a brief delay,it creates a protective field at your location for 2.5 seconds.Allied champions within the field are dealt 3800% less damage(8 second cooldown) Use this hidden op item before they take it down.
Its in live server too,at least the new description is live if you go and see it either in game or in item set

Its funny that riot didnt said that they will give only 40 ppl out of 200! challengers flex the rewards when season was on, but only after it ended! If your mindset was that you wanted to make it fair,then why you dont give oce challengers solo/duo only top 10 rewards,cause korea server is more difficult than oce ? But you used this mindset for flex vs solo/duo and you didnt said anything till season end. Who knows next season maybe players that play low difficulty champion dont get rewards,or something else weird.... Everyone would be happy if you had announced this but you wanted challengers to play more cause they thought they will get reward... Just to know RIOT,this season less than 1/4 last year challengers will play ranked and most challengers will be d3 players... No reason to tryhard and get flamed/trolled/abused/racism 1 in 2 games for 500 games and in the end, even if you end challenger you get nothing!NOT EVEN THE CHALLENGER RECALL! Why to tryhard when you can troll in normals,have fun and still earn the same things as ranked? Dont play ranked guys if you play for the rewards,every season they change everything last moment without anyone can do nothing! Sry for long post,ex-challenger here in flex that didnt had time to collect 600 points and tried flex for the 350 points challenger TLDR: Dont play rankeds for rewards,RIOT is unstable with their future decisions. Normal games gt;Rankeds(rankeds stressful,normals are chill)

Yeah but this is what riot did with flex and soloq players....They said that fewer players=fewer rewards,so why oceania(or japan and russia that have same playerbase) have the same rewards with koreans(or euw) when their playerbase are 1/20 of kr and euw.
Yeah but why they announced that only top 40 will get rewards 5 months AFTER season ended? Riot at its finest

Just to know,they misinformed(lied) to their playerbase so high elo games dont have high queue. If they wanted to make players to play the game(generally,not ranked)they would have added events for matchmade games etc. Also last thing,in start of season riot said that flex with soloq will have the same rewards

rank 201 master probably better than rank 40 flex... Yeah and my plat friend deserves at least master but his team is dragging him down.....PROBABLY Dont do random theories,sometimes mastersoloq gt;rank40flex but sometimes not,give statistics to prove your theory and not soloq players opinions. Generally i feel betrayed and as an ex-challenger flex that still wasted a lot of hours going challenger flex(350 points) i will probably play only normals Normals are less tilting and more rewarding than rankeds.

Just to know,if you dont play duo with a trusted person,20% of your games are depended on your gameplay and the other 80% are pure coinflip(which team have the flamer/tilter/afker/inter/downer).Not so competitive
One's trash is another's treasure!

If riot had reduced(or removed) the 60+ ad that E shield gives,janna would be 49-50 % and all janna mains would be fine(my thought ofc).Now janna get banned or firstpicked so some nerf wouldnt be bad for mains
Its actually 5 months after season ended
Upgrade your internet/pc and anything essential that affects quality of gameplay.You and your grandma will love the game more.

We are Kaisa

The problem is that Challengers can duo.Last season you couldnt duo when you were in challenger,so only the very best players could stay in top 200.Now you can play with your duo smurf and easily achieve it.Randoms vs randoms is more fair than randoms vs premades. The problem with Riots challenger duo abuse is simple.They cant make it fair without losing something.Here is why: If they make it like last season(only solo),the challenger queue time will go up by a lot,and all the challengers will just smurf in other accounts cause they cant wait 1 hour to find game. If they keep having the current system,it will not be fair EXCEPT if they implement the rule premades vs premades (1 prem vs 1 prem) or (2 prem vs 2 prem).It will add some queue time but it will be fair for everyone.

Duo queue shouldnt exist in challenger(it was like this last season).Challengers are supposed to be players good enough to go pro.So someone going pro,isnt good enough without his duo? I have seen lulu,taric,janna players playing like low plat players and getting carried by twitch, yi etc. smurfs to challenger.

If they want to play to improve,they can play ranked flex with other enemy premades.They mostly abuse duo in soloq to climb easier elo.If it was duo vs duo it would be okay.But it doesnt work that way in soloq.
It may works in lower elo that there are more players,but in challenger elo it doesnt work all the time(the system just fills 10 players to find game quicker)
It starts in saturday 3rd november ?Cause in client it says in saturday night
Fck off and go sea monkey somewhere else!

I think that they could give some cosmetic reward for pushing high trophy.
